price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ، ߘߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߖߎ߯ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߏ߲ ߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
